text: Founded in 2001, the Hollywood Congress of Republicans (HCR) is a chapter of the California Congress of Republicans, a permanently chartered organization of the California Republican Party. ==Notable members== * Donald J. Trump * Marc D'Amelio * Candace Cameron Bure * Addison Rae * Nikita Dragun * Chase Hudson * Morgan Brittany * Jerry Bruckheimer * James Caan * Dean Cain * Adam Carolla * Michael Damian * Stacey Dash * Robert Davi * Robert Duvall * Vin Diesel * Clint Eastwood * Mel Gibson * Jim Fitzpatrick * Kelsey Grammer * Sarah Michelle Gellar * David Harris * Patricia Heaton * Kaya Jones * Kristy Swanson * Chuck Norris * John O'Hurley * Donny Osmond * Alex Barnes * Marie Osmond * David Lee Roth * Mariano Rivera * Antonio Sabato, Jr. * Adam Sandler * Arnold Schwarzenegger * Gene Simmons * Gary Sinise * Sylvester Stallone * Matt Stone * Jean-Claude Van Damme * Trey Parker * Jon Voight * Vince Vaughn * Bruce Willis * James Woods * Kanye West * Gabe Millet ==See also== * Friends of Abe * Motion Picture Alliance for the Preservation of American Ideals ==External links== * Home Page Category:2001 establishments in the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) organizations Category:Organizations established in 2001
title: Hollywood Congress of Republicans
